description: This file is a C header file that declares private functions related to LAN management, such as stopping scans, retrieving LAN host comments, setting LAN host comments, and getting Ethernet port information. It also includes licensing information and include guards.
external_files: C header files or source files that might implement or include this header, not explicitly listed in the content but implied (e.g., LM_cmd_comment_t).

methods.name: lm_wrapper_priv_stop_scan
methods.description: Stops an ongoing LAN scan process.

methods.name: lm_wrapper_priv_getLanHostComments
methods.description: Retrieves comments associated with a LAN host based on its physical address.

methods.name: lm_wrapper_priv_set_lan_host_comments
methods.description: Sets comments for a LAN host using a command structure of type LM_cmd_comment_t.

methods.name: lm_wrapper_priv_getEthernetPort
methods.description: Retrieves Ethernet port information based on MAC address.
